729134f-a.text:
45 MoClean Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Lily Pond Avenue. The mansion was owned by Richardson, in 1874 (Beers's map); by Anna M. King, from 1898 to 1907 (Robinson maps); and by E. H.
Eglinton, in 1917 (8romley's map).
June 2, 1935
P. L. Sperr
Ne; N 380
729134f-a.folder: McClean Avenue & Lilly Pond Avenue, Staten Island, NY
